item.title: Problem with ancient staff?
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

im trying to make it on my server so you can only get ancient magicks if your wearing this ancient saff, this is the peice of code that i have.

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4675) // ancient staff { setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //magic tab (ancient = 1151); }

it does absolutley nothing on the server, and theres no errors when compiling. what am i doing wrong?

Read full topic
